title: thread '<unnamed>' panicked at 'wanted an rlib: "file too small to be an archive"', src/librustc_codegen_llvm/back/lto.rs:113:27

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
I am building the gles3 branch of https://github.com/cyclopsian/alacritty on an aarch64-linux-musl host running Alpine Linux.
Expand for log
